author: Byron Pulsifer
message: Patience is a virtue but you will never ever accomplish anything if you don't exercise action over patience.
title: Thought of the day

author: Robert Lynd
message: Any of us can achieve virtue, if by virtue we merely mean the avoidance of the vices that do not attract us.
title: Thought of the day

author: Ralph Emerson
message: If the single man plant himself indomitably on his instincts, and there abide, the huge world will come round to him.
title: Thought of the day

author: Donald Trump
message: Money was never a big motivation for me, except as a way to keep score. The real excitement is playing the game.
title: Thought of the day
